Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: @actionslacks marketing did not save eos with 4B

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: We need to get over this mentality that marketing will fix alts, real partnerships and real tech will win out in the end

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Everyone in the community has a responsibility to themselves to go out and tell people about KMD if they want to move away this bot/TA trading environment we currently have to a more sustainable FA based market

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Marketing is only a small % of brand awareness, the other major parts are a working product/tech and people spreading this by word of mouth.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: If the marketing is failing, the community is failing to deliver. People need to take some responsibility for this failure as well, the question is will the community step up and fix it or procrastinate and complain?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: If it is the former, great, we will be able to achieve great things together, if it is the latter, better sell now and head to greener alts like insight chain with 5x today on 5k volume.
